courseDetails.title: Cómo Crear un Embudo de Ventas con WordPress Desde Cero 2023
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a cómo crear un embudo de ventas con WordPress y consigue clientes a través de Internet.
courseDetails.longDescription:
WORDPRESS es una plataforma para construir y diseñar sitios web, tales como blogs, tiendas virtuales, escuelas virtuales, embudos y páginas de ventas, sin necesidad de tener experiencia en diseño web y programación, puedes diseñar cualquier tipo de sitio web de forma fácil y simple.


El 38% de los sitios web de Internet han sido creados con WordPress. Es una herramienta muy fácil de aprender y se puede personalizar un sitio web de WordPress para cualquier propósito. Ya sea que desees crear un portafolio personal, un blog o un sitio web comercial para vender tus productos y servicios.


En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar un embudo de ventas con WordPress, utilizando el constructor visual de Elementor que nos brinda la flexibilidad de crear y diseñar nuestro embudo de ventas con WordPress, utilizando los temas y plantillas que nos brinda el constructor visual, que llevarán tu diseño web al siguiente nivel, y por último integraremos nuestro embudo de ventas a una plataforma de email marketing, para que puedas registrar los datos de tus suscriptores en una base de datos.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos tu embudo de ventas en WordPress, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrás tu embudo de ventas diseñado a tu gusto e integrado a una plataforma de email marketing.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo obtener un dominio y hosting para crear tu embudo y página de ventas.

  • Cómo instalar WordPress y un certificado SSL para tu dominio.

  • Cómo crear embudos de ventas profesionales con WordPress desde cero.

  • Cómo personalizar el diseño de tu embudo de ventas de forma profesional.

  • Cómo integrar tu embudo de ventas con una plataforma de email marketing.

  • Cómo crear un formulario de suscripción e integrarlo con tu embudo de ventas.

  • Cómo crear automatizaciones de correo para los usuarios registrados en tu embudo de ventas.

  • Cómo crear páginas de ventas con WordPress y Elementor desde cero.

  • Cómo personalizar el diseño de tu página de ventas de forma profesional.


¿POR QUÉ ACCEDER A NUESTRO CURSO?


Nuestro curso de "Cómo Crear un Embudo de Ventas con WordPress Desde Cero", es impartido por el experto y consultor de marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de tutoriales y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 170,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), en el que le mostrará las diversas formas de crear un embudo de ventas con WordPress de forma fácil y simple.



¡ACCEDE AHORA AL CURSO!


Inscríbase ahora y empiece con su aprendizaje en nuestro curso. Hay herramientas interesantes, atractivas y nuevas que aprender en la plataforma de WordPress.

Si tiene alguna pregunta sobre el contenido del curso o algo relacionado con este tema, siempre puede publicar una pregunta en el curso o enviarme un mensaje directo.

¡Adelante, haz clic en el botón de COMPRAR AHORA y te veré en la lección 1!

Saludos,

Renato Jesús Yacolca Neyra

courseDetails.title: TypeScript for Beginners: Mastering TypeScript Fundamentals
courseDetails.shortDescription: Unlock the Power of TypeScript for Modern Web Development
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you ready to embark on a journey into the world of TypeScript? Welcome to our comprehensive course designed to equip you with the knowledge and skills needed to become a proficient TypeScript developer.

TypeScript has gained immense popularity in recent years for good reason. It brings strong typing and enhanced tooling to JavaScript, making it easier to write robust, maintainable code for both small projects and large-scale applications. In this course, you'll delve into TypeScript from the ground up, starting with the basics and progressing to advanced topics and real-world application development.

The course begins with a solid foundation, introducing you to TypeScript's syntax, setup, and essential concepts. You'll explore the differences between JavaScript and TypeScript, gain insights into popular frameworks that leverage TypeScript's capabilities, and discover why it has become an industry standard.

You'll learn how to set up your development environment with Visual Studio Code and TypeScript, enabling a seamless coding experience. As you dive deeper into the language, you'll grasp key concepts like variables, data types, functions, interfaces, and classes.

Array methods and advanced topics such as inheritance, modules, and access modifiers will be covered in detail, providing you with a comprehensive understanding of TypeScript's capabilities. You'll explore TypeScript configurations to tailor your development environment to your needs, making it easier to manage large projects efficiently.

Promises and asynchronous programming will be demystified, allowing you to write asynchronous code confidently. You'll also get hands-on experience by building a practical project – a To-do App – that reinforces your skills and demonstrates how TypeScript can be used in real-world scenarios.

Towards the end of the course, you'll peer into the future of TypeScript, discovering how it integrates seamlessly with popular frameworks like React. You'll also gain insights into the vibrant TypeScript community and the wealth of resources available to support your ongoing learning journey.

Whether you're a beginner looking to grasp the fundamentals or an experienced developer aiming to harness TypeScript's full potential, this course will empower you to write cleaner, safer, and more maintainable code. Join us and become a TypeScript master, ready to tackle the challenges of modern web development with confidence.

Power Apps es una herramienta creada por Microsoft que permite a los usuarios crear aplicaciones útiles rápidamente, sin necesidad de saber cómo programar. courseDetails.title: Selling With Ease - Sales Skills to Grow Your Business
courseDetails.shortDescription: Go from quaking-in-your-boots to closing loads of sales with confidence anywhere, your way….
courseDetails.longDescription:
“I just don’t like selling. Something about it feels weird, awkward and off to me.”

That’s what most heart-centered entrepreneurs say about selling their work online.

If you’ve thought something familiar (maybe even in the last 24 hours?) you’re far from alone.


In fact, if you find yourself nodding your head yes to any of the following statements, you’re in the right place…


– You break out into a cold sweat or get heart palpitations at the mere thought of “selling” (or maybe even just promoting) your offers

– You struggle with almost every aspect of sales calls–– from how to open, how to close and/or how in the world to handle objections (Or maybe you’re ‘okay’ on sales calls until you have to say your prices out loud – and then you chicken out, lowball yourself or give an impromptu discount!)

– You know you’re much better in writing or on pre-recorded video and wish you could figure out how to sell in a way that’s more natural to you, but doesn’t sacrifice your income


– You’re making so-so sales, but you have a not-so-little inkling there’s something holding you back


Sound about right? If so, I have some good news:

Selling Your Soul’s Work CAN Be Simple, Fun & (Almost) Effortless!

I get it. When I first launched my Clinical Hypnotherapy Practise in 2020, I had zero clients, we were in the middle of a pandemic and I could only see clients online, my journey began from the virtual ground zero.

However, I wasn't starting entirely from scratch. With two decades of sales experience under my belt, I understood the importance of targeting, relationship-building, and value proposition. I harnessed these skills to pivot my strategies online, identifying and reaching out to potential clients who could benefit the most from virtual hypnotherapy.

While many struggled to adapt, my sales background provided me a unique edge. I wasn't just selling a service; I was offering transformation, and healing in turbulent times. Within a short span, I grew my client base exponentially, turning my practice into a 6-figure venture.

The journey wasn’t without its challenges, but by leveraging my extensive sales know-how, I was able to not only attract the right clients but also offer them genuine value, cementing their trust and loyalty.

My mission now is to share this knowledge with you. In this course, we'll delve deep into shifting doubts and beliefs around selling, enabling you to generate sales with unmatched confidence and consistency.


What if I told you it’s 100% possible to retrain your brain to view selling as service, find new ways to sell that feel good in your nervous system and actually get clients to say “YES!” faster and easier (over and over again!)–no heart palpitations required?

I know that might sound like a major stretch given your current situation or beliefs about selling (and trust me, friend–I’ve heard them all!).

I also know that if you’re here, you want to learn how to sell in a more effortless, simple way.

And honestly, it’s necessary.

Because here’s the deal, if you run a business, you’re already a salesperson.

And if you want to continue to run your business, you have to continue to sell.


It’s just fact.


So, why not learn how to do it in a way that’s less stressful – and more fruitful, to boot?

Whether sales totally stress you out or you’re a decent salesperson but aren’t yet swimming in bathtubs of cash like you thought you’d be, believe me when I say you probably have some limiting beliefs swimming just beneath the surface of your subconscious that are unknowingly sabotaging your success.


The good news is you have the power to change all of that.


By the end, you’ll feel good–dare I say, excited? –about selling your stuff, instead of dreading it. You’ll know deep-in-your-bones that your offers and expertise are worth paying for. And you’ll have unshakable confidence in your ability to sell in ways that feel genuine & natural (including on autopilot, if you so choose!).

Just imagine…

✓ Feeling deeply confident next time you need to hop on a “quick Discovery call”– instead of stressing & sweating over it for days or weeks in advance

✓ Showing up online and “selling” in simple ways that play to your natural strengths–not go against them

✓ Waking up every morning to Stripe notifications and/or inquiry DMs from dreamy ideal clients who are resonating hardcore with your marketing

✓ Finally being paid your worth–at a price that’s also a total steal for your clients & customers!

✓ Unapologetically selling in every email or social media post you publish–without doing anything unnatural, forced or fake (hello, sold out launches and goodbye feast-or-famine cycle!)

✓ Knowing how to open, close and cinch a sale over Zoom without saying or doing anything remotely sales-y or sleazy (You’ll even know how to handle objections like a [sensitive] boss!)

… and so, so much more!


Here's the deal: Sales is a learnable skill. (And thank goodness for that!)

But even though you’ll find “sales advice” plastered all over the Internet (and off!), most of it doesn’t apply to heart-centered entrepreneurs.

It’s either too focused on slimy old school tactics that are wildly pushy and unnatural – or it’s so woo-woo you don’t actually learn any tangible sales skills (so you still don’t feel as confident as you could).

Well, that’s where Sell with Ease comes in.

It’s specifically tailored to heart-centered entrepreneurs who care about their clients & customers, AND it’s super practical and actionable.


Which means? This isn’t one of these trainings that simply tells you to, “Just repeat these sales mantras for 30 days and boom you’ll be a millionaire!” (For the record, I’m not knocking mantras and affirmations–but I am saying there’s more to the story.)

It's also not going to teach you how to “persuade” anyone to buy from you with sketchy, old school “mind tricks.”

But what it is going to do is provide you with grounded and ground-breaking mindset shifts you can make on the inside AND practical actions you can take on the outside to make selling your stuff a total breeze–not a burden.

And better yet? I can almost guarantee you’ll secure even more sales as a result.


Listen: When you know how to sell well (and better yet, do it your way), everything changes.


Just imagine no longer feeling “freaked out” or like you’re faking it on sales calls – or anywhere else you sell online! – and instead oozing with confidence, cinching new clients left & right and doing it all without breaking a sweat.


It’s possible.

And let’s be real: Selling your soul’s work shouldn’t feel like torture.


It’s time to stop letting your fears & doubts about selling stop you from making the income and living the freedom-based lifestyle you desire.

Sound good? Can’t wait to see you on the inside!
targetAudiences: Emerging Sales Professionals: Whether you're just beginning your journey in the sales arena or looking to refine your foundational skills, this course provides the tools to navigate sales scenarios with newfound confidence and ease.
Established Salespeople Facing Burnout or Stagnation: If you've hit a plateau or find yourself dreading the sales process, discover strategies to rejuvenate your approach and reignite your passion.

Entrepreneurs and Small Business Owners: For those who wear multiple hats, the challenge of selling can be daunting. Learn how to embrace the sales process as an integral part of your business growth, rather than a dreaded chore.

Individuals with Sales Resistance: If the very word "sales" sends shivers down your spine due to past negative experiences or perceptions, this course is your gateway to reshaping those beliefs, allowing you to engage in sales from a place of authenticity and ease.

Professionals Transitioning into Sales Roles: Moving from a different career domain? Equip yourself with proven methodologies and mindset shifts to excel in your new role with assurance and consistency.

courseDetails.title: COBIT FOUNDATION 2019 Mock Questions - 06 Test & Explanation
courseDetails.shortDescription: Better prepare to become the certified ISACA COBIT FOUNDATION with latest updated questions & explanations
courseDetails.longDescription:
COBIT Foundation 2019 is an entry-level certification exam that tests your knowledge of the concepts, principles, and methodologies used to establish, enhance, and maintain a system for effective governance and management of enterprise information technology.

The COBIT 2019 framework is a comprehensive set of tools and guidelines that can be used by organizations of all sizes to improve their IT governance and management practices. The framework is based on five principles:

  • Principle 1: Meeting stakeholder needs. The COBIT 2019 framework is designed to help organizations meet the needs of all their stakeholders, including business users, IT professionals, and regulators.

  • Principle 2: Covering the enterprise end-to-end. The COBIT 2019 framework covers all aspects of IT governance and management, from strategic planning to operational control.

  • Principle 3: Applying a risk-based approach. The COBIT 2019 framework helps organizations identify and manage IT risks in order to protect their assets and achieve their objectives.

  • Principle 4: Enabling a holistic approach. The COBIT 2019 framework provides a holistic view of IT governance and management, taking into account the needs of the business, the capabilities of IT, and the risks involved.

  • Principle 5: Separating governance from management. The COBIT 2019 framework distinguishes between governance and management, providing guidance on how to ensure that these two functions are effectively aligned.

The COBIT Foundation 2019 exam is a multiple-choice exam that consists of 60 questions. The exam is administered by PeopleCert and can be taken online or at a testing center. The passing score for the exam is 70%.

The COBIT Foundation 2019 certification is a valuable credential for anyone who wants to demonstrate their knowledge of IT governance and management. The certification can help you improve your career prospects and advance your career in IT.

Here are some of the benefits of achieving COBIT Foundation 2019 certification:

  • Demonstrate your knowledge of IT governance and management principles and practices.

  • Enhance your career prospects and opportunities for advancement.

  • Gain a competitive edge in the job market.

  • Improve your understanding of the COBIT framework and how to use it to improve your organization's IT governance and management practices.

ABOUT THIS COURSE

I am confident that the practice question bank will help you to prepare for the actual exam and to build your confidence.

I am sharing the practice question bank with others who are preparing for the COBIT exam. I hope that it will be helpful to them as they prepare for the exam.

Here are some additional things that I would like to say about the practice question bank:

  • I have been working on the question bank for several months, and I am constantly adding new questions and updating the existing questions.

  • I am always looking for feedback on the question bank, so please feel free to send me your thoughts.

I hope these course help you pass the COBIT FOUNDATION 2019 exam!
targetAudiences: IT professionals who are involved in IT governance and management
Business professionals who are responsible for IT
Anyone who wants to learn more about the COBIT framework and how to use it to improve IT governance and management
